de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.vectorindex

Class BerkeleyDbEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.vsm.store.vectorindex.BerkeleyDbEnvironment

  • public class BerkeleyDbEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience class which wraps a BerkeleyDb environment. Set cacheSize to null or -1 to use default. Can be used as UIMA resource
    Author:
    chmuelle

    • Constructor Detail

      • BerkeleyDbEnvironment

        public BerkeleyDbEnvironment()
        Used by UIMA

      • BerkeleyDbEnvironment

        public BerkeleyDbEnvironment(java.lang.String dbEnvPath,
                     boolean isReadOnly,
                     boolean allowCreateNew,
                     java.lang.Long cacheSizeInMB)
                      throws com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseException
        Parameters:
        dbEnvPath - path to db environment
        isReadOnly - If true, then all databases opened in this environment must be opened as read-only. If you are writing a multi-process application, then all but one of your processes must set this value to true.
        allowCreateNew - If true, the database environment is created when it is opened. If false, environment open fails if the environment does not exist. This property has no meaning if the database environment already exists.
        cacheSizeInMB -
        Throws:
        com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseException
